## Load the packages

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, sf, tmap, sfdep, ggplot2)
```

Load the Singapore Map (NOTES: We only want the PLN_AREA_N)

```{r}
mpsz <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", 
                  layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```
